import React, {Component} from "react"; import { BrowserRouter, Route, Link } from "react-router-dom"; import GameRoomTwoPNG from './GameRoomTwoPNG.png'; import DamageEffects from "../DamageEffects/DamageEffects"; import { ToastContainer } from 'react-toastify'; import 'react-toastify/dis/ReactToastify.css'; const RoomTwo = (props) => { if(props.roomTwoStatus === 0){ return (

This Is Room Two

You are encountering a dangerous circle. It has {props.enemyHealth} health, {props.enemyAttackLow} attackLow, {props.enemyAttackHigh} attackHigh, {props.enemySpeed} speed, {props.enemyArmor} armor, and will reward you with {props.enemyReward} coin.

) } if (props.roomTwoStatus === 1 ) { return(

This Is The GameBoard Room Two

You killed a dangerous circle. It rewarded you with {props.enemyReward} coin.

{/* */}
) } } export default RoomTwo;
